This is the homepage for STA 313 - Advanced Data Visualization taught by [Dr. Mine Çetinkaya-Rundel](http://mine-cr.com/) in Spring 2024 at Duke University. All course materials will be posted on this site.

You can find the course syllabus [here](/syllabus) and the course schedule [here](/).
